Type.Name: EndOfStreamException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit EndOfStreamException extends System.IO.IOException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when an attempt is made to read past the end of a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Attempted to read past the end of the stream." This message takes into account the current system culture.
The property of the new instance is initialized to .

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
